statements: INSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, planting_date, harvest_date) VALUES (1, 'Tomato', 'Vegetable', '2022-05-01', '2022-08-15') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Tomato', type = 'Vegetable', planting_date = '2022-05-01', harvest_date = '2022-08-15';

INSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, planting_date, harvest_date) VALUES (2, 'Carrot', 'Vegetable', '2022-04-15', '2022-07-30') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Carrot', type = 'Vegetable', planting_date = '2022-04-15', harvest_date = '2022-07-30';

INSERT INTO crops (id, name, type, planting_date, harvest_date) VALUES (3, 'Apple', 'Fruit', '2022-03-01', '2022-10-30') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = 'Apple', type = 'Fruit', planting_date = '2022-03-01', harvest_date = '2022-10-30';
UPSERT INTO field (field_id, field_name, crop_type, field_size) VALUES (1, 'Field A', 'Wheat', 100)
UPSERT INTO field (field_id, field_name, crop_type, field_size) VALUES (2, 'Field B', 'Corn', 150)
UPSERT INTO field (field_id, field_name, crop_type, field_size) VALUES (3, 'Field C', 'Soybean', 120)
UPSERT INTO crop (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type) VALUES (1, 'Corn', 'Grain')
UPSERT INTO crop (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type) VALUES (2, 'Wheat', 'Grain')
UPSERT INTO crop (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type) VALUES (3, 'Tomato', 'Vegetable')

INSERT INTO Crop (crop_id, crop_name, crop_type, plant_date, harvest_date) VALUES (1, 'Tomato', 'Vegetable', '2022-01-01', '2022-03-31') ON CONFLICT (crop_id) DO UPDATE SET crop_name = 'Tomato', crop_type = 'Vegetable', plant_date = '2022-01-01', harvest_date = '2022-03-31';

INSERT INTO Field (field_id, field_name, area, soil_type, crop_id) VALUES (1, 'Field A', 10.5, 'Sandy Loam', 1) ON CONFLICT (field_id) DO UPDATE SET field_name = 'Field A', area = 10.5, soil_type = 'Sandy Loam', crop_id = 1;

INSERT INTO WeatherSensor (sensor_id, location, sensor_type, field_id) VALUES (1, 'North Field A', 'Temperature', 1) ON CONFLICT (sensor_id) DO UPDATE SET location = 'North Field A', sensor_type = 'Temperature', field_id = 1;
